title: Mastery Course for Practical Tennis Serve and Return Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Fundamental Tennis Skills (Grip, Stance, Swing)
context.additional_context: Utilization of mobile-based VR simulations to replicate real-game training environments, providing personalized feedback through individual performance data analysis

learning_goals: Achieve a sub success rate of 75% or higher in actual matches.
Land 80% or more of return-of-serve shots within the court.
Select and apply three types of serves (flat, spin, slice) with 80% accuracy based on game situations.
Improve accuracy in predicting serve direction and return positions by 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
